amendment.description: To strike the requirement for the Department of Defense to describe an Analysis of Alternatives for replacing the capabilities of the KC-135 aircraft fleet.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1821 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1821 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S12357; text: CR S12357) To strike the requirement for the Department of Defense to describe an Analysis of Alternatives for replacing the capabilities of the KC-135 aircraft fleet.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1821 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1821 proposed by Senator Stevens.
